#include <cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	int t, i, j;
	int r = 0, b = 0, g = 0;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while (t--) {
		r = -1;
		g = -1;
		b = -1;
		int a[3];
		string s = "";
		cin >> s;
		int k = 0;
		int x = 10000000;
		for(i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
			if(s[i] == 'R') {
				r = i+1;
				if(r >= 0 && g >= 0 && b >= 0) {
					a[0] = r;
					a[1] = b;
					a[2] = g;
					sort(a, a+3);
					k = a[2]-a[0]+1;
//					k = calc(r, g, b);
					if (k < x) {
						x = k;
					}
				}
			}
			else if(s[i] == 'G') {
				g = i+1;
				if(r >= 0 && g >= 0 && b >= 0) {
					a[0] = r;
					a[1] = b;
					a[2] = g;
					sort(a, a+3);
					k = a[2]-a[0]+1;
//					k = calc(r, g, b);
					if ( k < x) {
						x = k;
					}
				}
			}
			else {
				b = i+1;
				if(r >= 0 && g >= 0 && b >= 0) {
					a[0] = r;
					a[1] = b;
					a[2] = g;
					sort(a, a+3);
					k = a[2]-a[0]+1;
//					k = calc(r, g, b);
					if ( k < x) {
						x = k;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n", x);
	}
	return 0;
}
